availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Farmer in Mercer County in 1860. Married to Nancy J. McIntire. Father of Davis T. McIntire, Dudley A. McIntire, John W. McIntire, Elizabeth McIntire, Nancy C. McIntire, Perlina E. McIntire, and Hersich B. McIntire. Served in Company C of the 11th Kentucky Cavalry (U.S.) as a sergeant from September 1862 to July 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 571
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0109.
